grid.title: Discord Bot Architect
grid.description: cross-platform app that aims to make it easier for people with the creation of Discord`s bots. This is a full-featured app.

grid.title: 50 Projects in 50 days
grid.description: I encouraged myself to make 50projects in 50 days from scratch to top. Using just ReactJS without extensions.

grid.title: Crosshair Assist
grid.description: A crosshair marker for when playing games such as valorant/cs go. This project will center a crosshair icon in your screen.

grid.title: Trick Time LTD
